Section.name: About RISE Krishna Sai Gandhi Group of Institutions
Section.description:
RISE Groups of Institutions (RISEGI), Ongole were established in 2009 RISE has two unique groups the RISE Gandhi Group of Institutions and the RISE Prakasam Group of Institutions to offer unparalleled Engineering, Management and Computer Education. The two Groups are under the single umbrella called RISE which stands for Rural Institute of Social and Economic Empowerment
